name: beatmania 5thMIX -Time to get down-
summary: 5th release in Konami's DJ simulation franchise. It was released on September 22nd, 1999. Features crossover tracks from beatmania IIDX, Dancemania and DanceDanceRevolution franchises. It has 30 songs in total, including old songs from beatmania 4thMIX -the beat goes on-.
